cause.description:
I have vowed to raise at least $5000 for the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society and run a full marathon in Maui this September to help find a cure for blood cancers. I am running to save lives.
Go to www.active.com/donate/tntvan/LollyO
Please help me save lives!
1. Together we can make a difference!
cause.name: Team In Training!
